meanings.definition: An act of supporting the body in a vertical position by balancing on the hands.
meanings.sent1: During gym class, Sarah showed off her impressive handstand skills.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast effortlessly held a perfect handstand for several seconds.
meanings.sent3: At the circus, the clown attempted a handstand but ended up falling comically.
meanings.sent4: In yoga, mastering a handstand can feel like defying gravity.
meanings.sent5: The handstand competition showcased incredible strength and balance.

meanings.sent1: I can't wait to practice my handstand at the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The acrobat decided to handstand on the balance beam for the grand finale.
meanings.sent3: As a dare, Tim challenged his friend to handstand on a skateboard.
meanings.sent4: She handstands every morning as part of her workout routine.
meanings.sent5: The gymnast's ability to handstand with such grace amazed the audience.
